articles.author: Hugh Linehan
articles.title: Memo to Elon Musk: Be like the bluebird
articles.description: Hugh Linehan: It takes preternatural chutzpah to replace the traditional symbol of hope and happiness with a letter of the alphabet associated with nihilism, crypto-fascism and porn
articles.content: Its been a confusing week. Ken was hauled before the House Un-American Activities Committee. Harry Truman unleashed a sparkly pink mushroom cloud over Hiroshima. And Elon Musk, aka death, destroyer o… [+4419 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: 'X' logo installed atop Twitter building, spurring San Francisco to investigate
articles.description: City officials say replacing letters or symbols on buildings requires a permit for design and safety reasons. The installation is part of Elon Musk's effort to rebrand the social media platform.
articles.content:
A large metal "X" sign is seen on Friday on top of the downtown San Francisco building that housed what was once Twitter.
Haven Daley/AP
SAN FRANCISCO The city of San Francisco has opened a complai… [+1715 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: ‘X’ logo installed atop Twitter building, spurring San Francisco to investigate permit violation
articles.description: San Francisco has opened a complaint and launched an investigation of a giant “X” sign that cropped up Friday on top of the downtown headquarters of the social media platform formerly known as Twitter. Billionaire Elon Musk, who bought the platform, announced…
articles.content:
By JANIE HAR and HAVEN DALEY (Associated Press)
